news.title: I deeply regret the position we're in, Streeting tells resident doctors
news.summary: The health secretary wrote to resident doctors before they begin a five-day strike at 07:00 BST on Friday.

news.title: One in five children in Gaza is malnourished, UN aid agency says
news.summary: The UN agency for Palestinians says it has thousands of truckloads of supplies near Gaza which it wants to deliver.

news.title: He went to get aid and didn't come back - stories of people killed in Gaza
news.summary: As aid agencies warn of "mass starvation", the BBC hears from the relatives of some of those killed in the past week.

news.title: Dad guilty of murdering premature baby in hospital
news.summary: Daniel Gunter inflicted “catastrophic injuries” to Brendon Staddon while he was in neonatal care.

news.title: Corbyn launches new party to 'take on rich and powerful'
news.summary: The former Labour leader joins forces with fellow Independent MP Zarah Sultana to launch "a new kind of political party".

news.title: As porn sites apply new age checks, will users hand over personal ID?
news.summary: All websites hosting pornography will have to check the age of their users from Friday.

news.title: England manager Sarina Wiegman 'not for sale at any price', says FA chief
news.summary: England manager Sarina Wiegman is "not for sale at any price", says the Football Association chief executive officer Mark Bullingham.

news.title: Justice department official expected to meet Epstein accomplice Ghislaine Maxwell
news.summary: The meeting comes as pressure grows on the Trump administration to release files linked to  the disgraced financier's sex trafficking network.

news.title: Jay Slater 'did not seem threatened', inquest told
news.summary: The 19-year-old spoke to his friend after leaving an Airbnb he had gone to with two men.

news.title: Why are Thailand and Cambodia fighting at the border?
news.summary: The roots of the South East Asian neighbours' dispute goes back to more than a century ago.
